title: Japan.Japan.(Lior Shamriz.2007).(DVDRip.Divx.Hebrew).divx
description:
<img src=\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"http://www.jehuti.com/japanjapan/images/japan_small.jpg\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\">

The movie tells the story of Imri, who at 19 goes to live in Tel- Aviv, but dreams of moving to Japan. Through his relationships and encounters and in diverse cinematic tools, we are introduced to the young man\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;s life. An exploration of living in the exotic city of Tel Aviv is presented through a hero who is himself in the midst of exploring his own choice of an exotic place. A unique correlation is formed between the hero\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;s misconception of Japan and ours of him. The movie was constructed by both improvised and pre-scripted scenes, as required by the nature of each scene.

	
Directed by
Lior Shamriz
